summary: Completed testing of Products management feature (PRODUKTY) for Ecommify e-commerce dashboard. All 14 backend API tests passed. All frontend UI flows working correctly. Features include: Product CRUD operations, extra_payment (dopłata) field for presale surcharges, automatic extra_payment calculation when creating orders based on matching products, badge 'Made with Emergent' confirmed removed from index.html.
passed_tests: Badge 'Made with Emergent' removed from index.html - NOT visible in UI
API: GET /api/products returns list of products
API: POST /api/products creates product with name, sku, price, extra_payment, shop_id, category
API: POST /api/products works with minimal data (only name and shop_id required)
API: GET /api/products?shop_id=X filters products by shop
API: PUT /api/products/{id} updates product fields
API: PUT /api/products/invalid_id returns 404
API: DELETE /api/products/{id} removes product
API: Order creation calculates extra_payment from matching products (qty * product.extra_payment)
API: Order with no matching products has extra_payment=0 in fulfillment
API: Multiple products in order sum extra_payments correctly
API: Login with PIN 2409 returns Admin user
API: Login with PIN 2609 returns Kacper user
API: Login with PIN 2509 returns Szymon user
API: Invalid PIN returns 401
UI: PRODUKTY section visible in Dashboard with product count badge
UI: Toggle button expands/collapses product list (Rozwin/Zwin)
UI: Products list shows name, SKU, price, and extra_payment (dopłata)
UI: Add product button (+) opens 'Nowy produkt' dialog
UI: Product dialog has all fields: Nazwa, SKU, Cena, Dopłata, Sklep, Kategoria
UI: Creating product shows 'Produkt dodany!' toast
UI: Edit button on hover opens 'Edytuj produkt' dialog with pre-filled data
UI: Save button in edit mode shows 'Zapisz zmiany' and toast 'Produkt zaktualizowany!'
UI: Delete button with confirmation removes product and shows 'Produkt usuniety' toast
seed_data_creation: Created/deleted test products during testing. Original 'Test Product' was cleaned up.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Products feature fully implemented with CRUD operations. Dashboard shows PRODUKTY section with expand/collapse, product count badge, and add/edit/delete functionality. Extra_payment (dopłata) field is cyan-colored to highlight presale surcharges. Order creation auto-calculates total extra_payment from matching products based on item name and quantity. Shopify/TikTok sync endpoints remain MOCKED (from previous iteration).

products.crud: Full CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)

order_extra_payment_calculation.logic: Matches order.items[].name with products.name, sums (product.extra_payment * item.quantity)
order_extra_payment_calculation.storage: Saved in fulfillment.extra_payment when order created
